page.title: 16Social Concerns
page.content: Residents are concerned to maintain the village atmosphere and avoid being taken over by the nearby City of Birmingham. After village concern about a number of accidents at the crossroads by the Post Office,the District Council have promised a 40 mph speed limit for the whole length of Blake St,and traffic lights at some future date. Heavy traffic uses these roads as a rat run between motorways.After a public enquiry weight restrictions were placed on Rosemary Hill Rd and Little Aston Lane. The threat of a new motorway to relieve the M6 has alarmed residents of Little Aston as one of the proposed routes would cross the good agricultural land just to the north of the village.The Minister's decision is expected very soon.
